data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Shizuishan, Ningxia Hui, China.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shizuishan, Ningxia Hui, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Shizuishan, Ningxia Hui, China that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.section_summary: On average, 61 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Shizuishan, Ningxia Hui, China.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Lord, for the leaders in the county of Shizuishan, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the county of Shizuishan against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Hui, Muslim Chinese people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Hui, Muslim Chinese people.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Shizuishan, Ningxia Hui, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Shizuishan, Ningxia Hui, China be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.section_summary:
the county of Shizuishan, Ningxia Hui, China has a population of 822,400.

We estimate Shizuishan has 62,388 people who might know Jesus, 13,286 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 746,726 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 62,388 believers in Shizuishan that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.
